title: Subulata Reniformis- Serif - Font ID
content:
Looking for a possible font Id on the serif font used for this magazine layout.

Many thanks in advance!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701095706im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_n3isvblZFz1qaekfeo1_1280_4217.jpg)

Font: 

 Romain 

Solved By: 

 [bowfinpw](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701095706/http:/typophile.com/user/2088 "View user profile.")

| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_n3isvblZFz1qaekfeo1\_1280.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701095706/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_n3isvblZFz1qaekfeo1_1280.jpg) | 90.22 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
From searching my Serif guide I think this may be "Romain BP" by Ian Party, but I have not been able to find a link to show the font. I got my sample from FontShop, but they no longer show it in their collection.

- Mike Yanega

Looking at the samples on the page R. linked, it seems that they may have used the Headline version of the font, which is a bit lighter in weight.

- Mike Yanega
